channel.description: Recent content in solutions on alexchiri.com

item.title: Three great books to start the year
item.description: Every year, I manage to read one or two books that get my mind going and give me ideas that I could either apply right away or that set me on a larger path of discovery. One or two out of tens, or to be more specific, last year, out of thirty. I started to look into ways I could organise notes and ideas that I find in books in a better way.
